abstract: A review of today's issues in the press across India.
snippet: A review of today's issues in the press across India.
lead_paragraph: Industrial production slowed to 4.1 percent in August, raising fears that India's economic growth could fall faster and further than analysts previously thought. Data showed a sharp decline in mining activity combined with slower growth in manufacturing. (Financial Express) One large Indian technology outsourcing company, Infosys, however, reported stronger growth in the three months ending in September, thanks in part to the declining rupee. (Mint)

headline.main: Newswallah: In the English-Language Press Thursday
